author: Staff Reporter
text:
Ongara Ashram, Puducherry conducted Annadanam to 1008 persons to commemorate the 80th birth anniversary of Onkaranantha Swami here on Tuesday.

Municipal Chairman N.Balachandar inaugurated the Annadanam in the presence of Ashram’s executive member S.Karunakaran, in front of Alankara Mandapam (16 pillared Mandapam) of Sri Arunachaleswarar Temple.

Then the distribution of food continued along the girivalam path.

All Panchabootha sthalams

The organisers said that the Annadanam were conducted in all the Panchabootha sthalams such as Kanchipuram, Thiruvanaikkaval, Kalahasthi and Chidambaram on the same day.
title: Annadanam to 1008 persons at Ongara Ashram
